data.message: Implement two-stage skill selection with domain expansion: Stage 1: strict anchor matching. Stage 2: domain expansion pulls foundational skills only after anchor proof. Added DOMAIN_KEYWORDS and FOUNDATIONAL_SKILLS configs. Test results: design query gets 2 anchors + 5 expanded = 7 skills.
data.task: Implement two-stage skill selection with domain expansion
data.outcome: Stage 1: strict anchor matching. Stage 2: domain expansion pulls foundational skills only after anchor proof. Added DOMAIN_KEYWORDS and FOUNDATIONAL_SKILLS configs. Test results: design query gets 2 anchors + 5 expanded = 7 skills.
